description: This file defines a Flutter widget called SettingsScreen, which provides a user interface for managing app preferences such as notifications, contrast, language, font size, WebSocket usage, and polling interval. It includes UI elements like switches, dropdowns, choice chips, sliders, and buttons, and interacts with a SettingsProvider state management class to get and set user preferences.

classes.name: SettingsScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget providing a settings UI for app preferences including notifications, contrast, language, font size, WebSocket, and polling interval.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the SettingsScreen, including app bar, navigation drawer, and a list of configurable user settings.
